extendedInfo.description: This particular scientific calculator was made to be as similar as possible to the commonly known one. -- Features:* Simple and yet intuitive user interface ( well known layout )* Supports mathematical expressions* History with unlimited entries* Editable history entries and current expression field with default keyboard ( for now)* Ability to restore state from history, not just see values* Persistent state* Memory management ( MC,MR,MS,M-,M+ )* Very accurate numbers, 18 digits after the dot!-- Layout:* Portrait mode provides basic functionality, with history list in top.* Landscape mode provides additional scientific functions.-- Operators:* +, -, *, /, %, mod, power, yroot-- Functions:* square root, cube root* square, cube* sin, cos, tan* asin, acos, atan* sinh, cosh, tanh* log, ln, e^x* factorial calculation (up to 170)* conversion number to int, fraction, exponent* convert decimal to dms(degrees, minutes, seconds) and back* enter number in exponent format* invert number-- Units:* Degrees* Radians* Gradians---------Feedback or feature requests are always welcome!

reviews.title: Froze on 2nd calc.
reviews.comment: Froze when I tried to do asin(23/31.5). Other trig functions seem to work.
reviews.author: Kevin Butcher

reviews.title: Syntax error
reviews.comment: Nexus7 One and only calculation I got a syntax error and it locked up. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Roger Campton

reviews.title: No foolin\' around
reviews.comment: I\'m sick of the skeuomorphics in the other apps, there is no need for a function button anymore. Thank you for getting rid of it.
reviews.author: A Google User
